ai-patthana8.44:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.44:0.3_0: (They are) productions that are produced by mind and kept rolling by mind.
ai-patthana8.44:1.1_0: or mind rolled on by the eighteen consciousnesses.
ai-patthana8.44:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
